entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is introduced as the one who cries 'Maman!' when she sees her mother, indicating that Fleur's mother has arrived. ("cried Fleur, rushing forward to embrace her.")

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as the one who is being greeted by Monsieur Delacour and his wife, Apolline. ("Bouncing toward Mrs. Weasley on high-heeled boots, he kissed her twice on each cheek,")

entities.name: monsieur delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is introduced as the husband of Apolline and the father of Fleur. ("Monsieur Delacour was nowhere near as attractive as his wife; he was a head shorter and extremely plump,")

entities.name: apolline
entities.description: Apolline is introduced as the wife of Monsieur Delacour. ("Let me present my wife, Apolline.")

relationships.description: Monsieur Delacour presents his wife, Apolline, indicating that they are married. ("Let me present my wife, Apolline.")
Monsieur Delacour is referred to as Fleur's father, indicating a parent-child relationship. ("Fleur tells us you ’ave been working very ’ard.")
Fleur and Mrs. Weasley are introduced as members of two families that are about to be united, indicating a family relationship. ("We are most honored at the approaching union of our two families!")
